file_content.text: The creature's dead, Mandalore. I've brought your proof.
Then it's time I introduced you to the other Grand Champions of the Great Hunt; meet your only peers in the galaxy.
We've gathered here to induct you into our exclusive group--the only hunters in the galaxy with access to jobs on the legendary Blacklist.
What's so special about this "Blacklist"?
I'm listening.
It's completely confidential. We're the only ones who can read it. Not even contract posters can see what's on the list.
So killing that creature was an initiation.
The trophy was my ticket in?
Yes, but not to the Blacklist.
And I suppose you take a cut for the privilege. Forget it, I can get my own work.
I'm not joining any union.
Settle down. We're just a group of professionals at the top of our game, nothing fancier than that.
The Blacklist's as old as the Great Hunt itself, got its own traditions. I need your help keeping one alive.
There's always been a Mandalorian in the group. Duty calls me away, so I want you to take my place--keep a Mandalorian among the Grand Champions.
I'm no Mandalorian.
I can't fill that void.
You're telling me "Mandalore" is throwing in the towel?
Wait, you're retiring?
War's in the air. Mandalore's gotta lead.
That a paying position?
What do I get out of it?
Being a Grand Champion has its perks, as does being a Mandalorian champion.
Killing that beast was your ritual blooding--so you're already Mandalorian in spirit, if not in name.
Now do me the honor of joining my brothers and sisters in the great clan.
All right, Mandalore, I accept.
As you wish.
You've just taken a load off my mind, champion.
Been waiting my whole life for this. I'm honored.
I've always wanted this.
You're life's just begun. Make it one no one will forget.
Champions, it's time we drink! Let's see how much black ale my replacement can put away.
I hate to leave such fine company, but it's time I got back to winning the Sith's wars for them. Champions, 'til we meet again.
I haven't seen the old man that happy in a long time. How's it feel to be a Mandalorian?
I'm no different than when I got here.
Nothing's changed.
Maybe you've been a Mandalorian all along, or maybe you're just stubborn.
Like I'm a part of something, not just another hired gun.
It feels great.
Aww, how sweet.
What do you care? It ain't like you're ever gonna be one.
Like I'm better than you.
That's right. I've already got a people--and a clan--and a code. I don't need another.
I'm done listening to you old war dogs drone on about honor and tradition.
No way. Mandalorians can rot.
Then get out of my sight. Get out, all of you!
Never met a woman with the guts to snub the leader of the Mandalorians straight to his face.
Never met a man with the guts to snub the leader of the Mandalorians straight to his face.
You just made the trip out here worth my time, newbie. Here. The look on that old hound's face was worth ten times that.
You three have something to say, spit it out.
What do you want?
He never should have got his hopes up.
Bet he never saw that coming.
Glad to see somebody else isn't around to suck up to Mandalore.
If you were waiting here to pat me on the back, you can call it a day.
Get lost.
Friendly. You and Jewl'a must have been separated at birth.
Friendly. I think we just found your soul mate, Jewl'a.
Name's Bloodworthy. These two miscreants are Jewl'a Nightbringer and the Defenestrator.
We just wanted you to know we sent a little welcoming present to your ship.
A Blacklist bounty, one of the two oldest on record to be exact.
Something to ease you into life at the top.
I'll be sure to check them out.
Noted.
I was wondering what I was going to do with myself.
Saves me from getting bored.
Oh, this ought to keep you busy for awhile.
Have your laughs. You chumps will be out of a job soon.
I don't need easing in.
We're about to find out.
We should get going. Our new friend here has plenty of work ahead of her. Don't be a stranger.
We should get going. Our new friend here has plenty of work ahead of him. Don't be a stranger.
Go, champion. Let the beast know fear.
Two Blacklist bounties, the two oldest on record to be exact.
Oh, these ought to keep you busy for a while.
